articles.title: Create Your Account
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: In order to start advertising with Adnexus, you need to create a Adnexus account!
articles.content:
To register for a Adnexus account, follow these steps:
1. Visit https://adnexus.co/
2. Click 'Create an Account' in the top right corner
3. Register using Google or enter personal details (first name, last name, work email, password)
keyNotes: Adnexus only accepts business emails for platform signups (we do not accept @gmail, @yahoo, etc.)
relatedArticles: I Can't Register with my Email Address

articles.title: How to Create Separate Strategies aka Ad Sets
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: Explains how to create and manage multiple strategies within a single campaign on the Adnexus platform.
articles.content: Your campaign can be split into as many strategies as you need to test different approaches within a campaign. Simply toggle between them under the campaign menu on the left side of your dashboard.
keyPoints: You can allocate different budgets to each strategy using the 'Strategy Daily Budget' field
Each strategy can have different configurations
